@lenasaur Yeah man I had a nice happy sleep. Ima be leavin for warwick at like 11 for BP tho.
Just found 3 rolls of film waiting to be developed... no moneyyyy.
@safetyguy1656 Heyyyyy good call!
@lenasaur can you bitches come hang out some more jeez
why am I up at 7:30 AM
so fucking bored
playing a little Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare. http://raptr.com/pseudoplacebo
Man I miss @lenasaur a lot. Mad boring by myself. =[
lookin at freenode channels cause EVERYONE ASLEEP
yo dad stop playing guitar what the fuck
Sitting in Wildflower because there's Internet here.
I just voted for Obama in #TwitVote -- http://twitvote.twitmarks.com/
Awake. Halloween was pretty cool. It's nice to actually have trick-or-treaters.
I am just not a fan of Halloween. Everything about it... Eh.
Drawing and meditating on my day and listening to whatever Last.fm radio pushes my way...
I'm not a big fan of coffee, however coffee-related metaphors always make me happy.
Looks like bad weather. Ugh. Holding onto the ends of a good summer is getting harder. What? It's October? Yeah, I hold tight.
Study hall. All I have to do is some easy english. It feels like friday.
My stomach hurts quiiiiiiite a bit. =[
So tired. Took extra time to sleep today. Very stuffy nose. Don't wanna do anything today but sit at home and watch movies. Woe is me.
I need to do some laundry before I can happily rest. Why am I still up anyway? I need to wake up far too early in the morning...

commits.message: refactor: Flatten indentation hell in listSaves() - extract helpers
MASSIVE SIMPLIFICATION: Remove all version complexity, ONE .metro format
feat: Implement V3 bundle format with autosave index (MASSIVE PERFORMANCE WIN)
Fix: Extract .data property from JSON saves for backwards compatibility
test: Add functional tests for v2 bundle format - ALL PASSING
fix: Complete v2 bundle format implementation - ALL CRITICAL BUGS FIXED
feat: Implement .metro bundle format (v2) for autosave consolidation
fix: Major autosave performance and reliability improvements
feat: add automated build commit info in footer
feat: integrate webmentions across blog and predictions
feat: add IndieWeb blogroll and changelog pages
remove /api/robot/mind endpoint
Merge pull request #670 from decisiondeskhq/fix-nyc-map-responsive
fix: filter invalid timestamps in robot/timeline API
fix: make NYC borough map fully responsive for tablet display
feat: add /api/robot/* endpoints for AI-queryable life data
fix: add Nitro hook to copy content directory to .output
fix: Add updates field to predictions API and fix GitHub commits path
feat: add live /now page + reading sparklines
feat: add ultra-dense sparkline visualizations to reading page
predict: update NYC mayor prediction 25% ‚Üí 80% & remove duplicate script
fix: remove demo update data from real NYC mayor prediction
fix: align predictions UI with site typography
fix: use static map for getFileExtension to avoid runtime errors
refactor: brutalist/academic UI redesign for predictions
fix: restore getFileExtension helper for template display
feat: add prediction update tracking system
